ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities in the osu-wiki repository include updates to the `MWC 7K 2025` team listing and rules, as well as translations and testing of game mode documentation. These changes aim to improve the accuracy and completeness of the wiki content, with multiple pull requests being submitted and merged to implement the updates.

ppy/osu-framework.summary: The osu-framework repository has seen significant activity with multiple pull requests focused on improving the build and functionality of the framework. These include adding linux-arm64 build support, native macOS image loading, and cleanup of Objective-C interop code. These changes aim to enhance the performance, compatibility, and maintainability of the framework.
